text: Aires Bonif√°cio Baptista Ali (born 6 December 1955) is a Mozambican politician. He was Prime Minister of Mozambique from 16 January 2010 to 8 October 2012. He was Governor of Inhambane Province from 2000 to 2004 and Minister of Education from 2005 to 2010. He was appointed ambassador to China in June 2016 by President Filipe Nyusi. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Mozambique Category:Ambassadors to China
title: Aires Ali
